# Service Attributes

## service.name

Logical name of the service.

| Property | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Type | `string` |
| Has PII | false |
| Exists in OpenTelemetry | Yes |
| Example | `omegastar` |

## service.version

The version string of the service API or implementation. The format is not defined by these conventions.

| Property | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Type | `string` |
| Has PII | false |
| Exists in OpenTelemetry | Yes |
| Example | `5.0.0` |
| Aliases | `sentry.release` |
